title: Riot, before you buff Marksmen AT ALL...
body:
Wait until you nerf assassins first. If you buff Marskmen and then nerf assassins right after, we're going to be back at square one. That will be literally the only thing viable bot lane...again. 

Assassins are way too strong right now anyways, so just try to hit them first.

replies.body: Or just nerf sup... the main reason why adc was as strong as it was...
There were across the board support itemization nerfs.

> [{quoted}](name=Ahri Body Pillow,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=iaynHKfY,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-07-07T03:14:11.030+0000)
>
> There were across the board support itemization nerfs.

Not enough to compensate the complete and massive strength support role gave to adcs.

Just the items existence increased the power of crit adcs by so much.

Theoretically; the assassins would still be weaker than ADC. That seems more like drawing it out but the same result occurring. I'd say tweak ADCs to be as viable as Assassins and buff up whatever is also weak would prob be better but who knows I don't know anything about game balancing. XP
